metadata.title: CVE-2021-31878 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in PJSIP in Asterisk before 16.19.1 and before18.5.1. To exploit, a re-INVITE without SDP must be received after Asteriskhas sent a BYE request.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
